questions.title: Voluntary Vulnerability Reporting
questions.content: Do you understand that you can voluntarily report vulnerabilities or cyber threats affecting the risk profile of your product with digital elements to a CSIRT coordinator or ENISA? (probably yes or no question)

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Voluntary Incident Reporting
questions.content: Do you understand that you have the ability to voluntarily notify a CSIRT coordinator or ENISA about security incidents or near misses that could have resulted in an incident? ( probably yes or no question )

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Processing of Voluntary Reports
questions.content: Are you aware that voluntary notifications are processed by the CSIRT coordinator or ENISA according to the same procedure as mandatory notifications under Article 16? (will be analyzed in another)

questions.title: Prioritisation of Mandatory Reports
questions.content: Do you understand that CSIRTs may prioritise mandatory notifications over voluntary ones?

questions.title: Third-Party Notification Handling
questions.content: If a third party (not you, the manufacturer) reports an actively exploited vulnerability or severe incident related to your product, are you aware that the CSIRT coordinator must inform you **without undue delay**?

questions.title: Confidentiality Protections
questions.content: Do you understand that CSIRTs and ENISA must protect the confidentiality of information submitted through voluntary reporting?
